tree.name: Jonathan Kuminga
tree.tradeDescription: Hawks trade Porzingis to Warriors for Kuminga and Buddy Hield
tree.note: Former #7 pick (2021), explosive athletic wing with star potential

assetsGivenUp.name: Kristaps Porzingis
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: 3-team trade: Hawks got Porzingis from Celtics, sent Niang to BOS, Mann + #22 pick to BKN

assetsGivenUp.name: Georges Niang
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Hawks traded De'Andre Hunter to Cavaliers for Niang, Caris LeVert, 3 second-round picks, and 2 pick swaps
assetsGivenUp.note: The Minivan - stretch four. Sent to BOS in Porzingis deal.

assetsGivenUp.name: De'Andre Hunter
assetsGivenUp.note: Virginia product, #4 overall pick 2019. Atlanta's own draft pick.

assetsGivenUp.name: Terance Mann
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Hawks traded Bogdan Bogdanović + 3 second-round picks to Clippers for Mann and Bones Hyland
assetsGivenUp.note: Versatile wing. Sent to BKN in Porzingis deal.

assetsGivenUp.name: Bogdan Bogdanović
assetsGivenUp.note: Signed via sign-and-trade from Sacramento Kings

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 MIN #31 Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Minnesota's 2025 2nd-round pick, sent to LAC in Mann trade

assetsGivenUp.name: 2026 MEM 2nd Round Pick (protected 43-60)
assetsGivenUp.note: Memphis' 2026 2nd-round pick, protected 43-60, sent to LAC in Mann trade

assetsGivenUp.name: 2027 LAC 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Clippers' own 2027 2nd-round pick, sent to LAC in Mann trade

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 #22 Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Hawks' own 2025 first-round pick, sent to Brooklyn
